{{header|1=Buscador}}

<form id="search">
Buscar: <input id="entry" type="text" value="" onkeyup="javascript:search();" /> <input id="button" type="button" value="Buscar" onclick="javascript:search();"/>
</form>

<div id="results">Sin resultados</div>

<script>
    //index start
    //index end
    
    function search() {
        entry = document.getElementById('entry').value;
        
        document.getElementById.innerHTML = '<ul>';
        for (i = 0; i < index.length; i++) {
            if (index[i][0].toLowerCase().indexOf(entry.toLowerCase()) > -1) {
                
                document.getElementById.innerHTML += '    <li><a href="' + index[i][1] + '.html">' + index[i][0] + '</a></li>';
                
            }
        }
        document.getElementById.innerHTML += '</ul>';    }
</script>
